mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_TRANS_INFO( ACCOUNT_TRANS_ID, MONEY, CRT_DATE, CRT_TIME, CHANNEL, CHANNEL_NAME, OPEN_ID ) VALUES( #{accountTransId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT_TRANS_ID, MONEY, CRT_DATE, CRT_TIME, CHANNEL, CHANNEL_NAME, OPEN_ID FROM ACCOUNT_TRANS_INFO ORDER BY CRT_DATE DESC LIMIT 10
